trans-unit.source: Collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref> class using the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>類別使用指定的集合。

trans-unit.source: Collection with which to instantiate the MaterialCollection.
trans-unit.target: 用來具現化 MaterialCollection 集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref> class with the specified capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>類別具有所指定的容量。

trans-unit.source: Integer that specifies the capacity of the MaterialCollection.
trans-unit.target: 指定 MaterialCollection 容量的整數。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> to the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref>結尾<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Item to add to the end of this collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目加入至這個集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the items from this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除所有項目<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> is in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref>是否在這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The item to locate in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在此集合中尋找的項目。

trans-unit.source: if value, the specified Material, is in this MaterialCollection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 、 指定的內容，位於這個 MaterialCollection; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Copies the items of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>, starting with the specified index value, into an array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 將這個項目複製<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"> </xref>，從指定的索引值，為陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The array that is the destination of the items copied from this MaterialCollection.
trans-unit.target: 從這個 MaterialCollection 複製的項目之目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 開始複製的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref>所包含的物件<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of Material objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 材料中包含的物件數目<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of Current.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>將列舉值前進到再讀取目前的值集合的第一個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Current returns the same object until either MoveNext or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 目前傳回相同物件，直到其中一個 MoveNext 或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: MoveNext sets Current to the next item.
trans-unit.target: MoveNext 會將目前設定為下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling MoveNext returns false.
trans-unit.target: 集合的末端後，列舉程式位在集合中，最後一個項目之後，而且呼叫 MoveNext 傳回 false。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to MoveNext returned false, calling Current throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果在上次呼叫 movenext 傳回 false，目前的呼叫會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To set Current to the first item of the collection again, you can call Reset followed by MoveNext.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定一次集合中的第一個項目前，您可以呼叫後面接著 MoveNext 重設。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to MoveNext or Reset throws an InvalidOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，並在下一個呼叫 MoveNext 或重設擲回 InvalidOperationException。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between MoveNext and Current, Current will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前 MoveNext 之間修改集合，目前會傳回設定為時，項目，即使列舉值已經無效。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取因此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can iterate the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The item at the specified index.
